title: First-Order Transfer Function Implementation
description: This function block implements a first-order transfer function characterized by time constant T and scaling factor K. It processes an input signal and outputs a signal that is the result of applying the transfer function to the input.
name: FT_IMP

input.name: in
input.description: The input signal to the transfer function.

input.name: T
input.description: The time constant of the transfer function.

input.name: K
input.description: The scaling factor applied to the output, default is 1.0.

output.name: out
output.description: The output signal after applying the transfer function.
